detail_desc: Playsuit in a soft, patterned viscose weave with buttons at the top and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Elasticated seam at the waist, patch front pockets and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Soft jersey pyjamas. Oversized top with long sleeves. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket with a button.
Long metal earrings. Length 10 cm.
Long, high-waisted skirt in a viscose weave with covered elastication at the waist and gathered seams creating tiers at the thighs and knees for added width. Unlined.
Wide, straight-cut top in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a double flounce in woven fabric at the front of the hem.
Tube scarf knitted in soft cotton with ribbed trims and a small appliqué at the bottom.
Short-sleeved dress in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and a seam and wide flounce at the hem.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh shoulder straps and a narrow racer back with elastic straps.
High-waisted trousers in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, back pockets and slim legs with raw-edge hems.
Set with a print-patterned swim top and matching pants. Top with a stand-up collar and short raglan sleeves. Pants with a lined gusset.
Smart shirt in a woven cotton blend with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Matching tie or bow tie.
Short top in a soft, airy weave made from a viscose blend with a deep V-neck front and back and narrow ties at the back to hold it in place. Double-layered flounce at the top and a smocked bodice.
Calf-length, fitted skirt in jacquard-patterned jersey. High waist with covered elastication, and a slit at the back. Unlined.
Short, bell-shaped skirt in imitation suede with decorative metal details on the front of the waistband, and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some mohair with long raglan sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbing around the slightly deeper neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hoop earrings in metal decorated with plastic beads in various designs. Diameter 3 cm.
Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, an opening at the top and small frilled collar that ties at the front. Frills front and back that continue over the shoulders, and a scalloped hem.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Leggings in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a glittery elastic waistband and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist, slightly lower crotch and zip fly and button.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket, yoke with pleat at the back and ties at the hem.
Ankle boots with a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 6.5 cm.

Short dress in satin with notch lapels and long sleeves. Wrapover front with a hook-and-eye fastener at the front, a concealed, adjustable fastening at one side and wide ties at the other, which define the waist. Unlined.
Push-up bra in ribbed jersey with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Wide top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lace collar and small embroidery detail on the chest. Opening and button at the back of the neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut jersey top with short, frill-trimmed sleeves.
Short, pleated skirt in a patterned weave with a high waist with covered elastication. Rounded hem that is shorter at the sides. Unlined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and no buttons.
Playsuit in ribbed jersey with tie-top shoulder straps and a deep V-neck and wrapover front and back. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short, wide legs.
Hat in felted wool with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 4 cm.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
Short, wide T-shirt in printed jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Set with soft ballet slippers and a hairband. Slippers in velour with soft soles, an elastic strap over the foot and decorative bow at the side. Elastic hairband with a velvet bow.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Leggings in an extra-soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.

Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacquard weave top with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back, and decorative straps at the back.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, long sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit.
Waist bag with a zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Size 6x13x19 cm.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a rounded front, short dolman sleeves and no fasteners.
Waist belt in elastic made from recycled polyester with a metal fastener at the front. Width 5 cm.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a text motif on the front.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.2 cm to 0.6 cm.
Short, fitted skirt in velour with decorative embroidery on the front and concealed elastication at the waist. Unlined.

Quilted, lightly padded jacket in woven fabric in a slightly longer, straight style. Small stand-up collar, lined hood with an elastic drawstring, and a zip down the front. Diagonal zipped pockets at the front, inner ribbing at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Elastic scrunchies in an airy weave.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, organic cotton flannel with buttons at the sides and straps with adjustable buttoning at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist, and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y). Lined at the top.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Long-sleeved dress in double-weave organic cotton with embroidery at the top and hem. Gathered yoke front and back, buttons at the back and elastication at the cuffs.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Metal earrings in different sizes with hoops at the bottom. Diameter of hoops 4 and 5 cm.
Dress with a soft jersey top, visible zip at the back and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on bow and a lined, flared skirt in a patterned weave with a sheen.
Ankle-length pull on-trousers in woven fabric. High waist with wide elastication and a small frill trim at the top, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sports vest top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a racer back and twisted side seams. Folded and glued edges for optimum comfort.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit socks.
Sleeveless body in jersey with lace details, a V-neck front and back, a wrapover front and press-studs at the crotch.
Short top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood. Worn details, reverse-stitched seams, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Short, straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with a wider neckline and short sleeves. Unlined.
Pouch bag in soft, transparent, printed plastic with a zip at the top. Size 22x32 cm.
T-shirt in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. Lined at the front. Medium support.
Scarves in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 30x80 cm.
Lined triangle bikini top with contrasting colour trims and gathered, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck.
Trousers in stretch, lightweight twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, and detachable elastic braces with imitation leather details.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Pool shoes with a wide fabric hook and loop tab with two fasteners (sizes 7-9 also have an elastic heel strap). Soft rubber soles with a fluted underside.
Dress in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a polo neck, long raglan sleeves and textured knit sections at the front.
